name: Spark
description: A special weapon Lin asked Mirroria R&D to make for Ruby. Its main functions include: Acting as the housekeeper in the play-house game, waking Ruby up in the morning, and leading the way for Ruby... But most importantly, protecting Ruby.

weaponEffects.title: Flame Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase flame ATK by **15%** and flame resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

normals.name: Spark Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack **5** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to **84.6%** of ATK plus **508** against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to **93%** of ATK plus **558** against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to **101.5%** of ATK plus **609** against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to **109.9%** of ATK plus **659** against each target.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to **253.7%** of ATK plus **1522** against each target and **launches** targets.

normals.name: Aerial Discharge
normals.description:
While airborne, tap the normal attack button to command Spark to attack **4** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to **97.1%** of ATK plus **583** against each target.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to **106.8%** of ATK plus **641** against each target.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to **121.3%** of ATK plus **728** against each target.
Fourth Attack: Deal total damage equal to **145.6%** of ATK plus **874** against each target.

normals.name: Gotcha!
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack or do this after Lockdown Zone is triggered to continuously fire searing energy beams at enemies in a target direction, dealing damage equal to **40%** of ATK plus **240**. Consumes Wanderer's endurance.

normals.name: Blazing Dive
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Blazing Dive.
Envelop the body in energy before rapidly plunging into the ground, dealing damage equal to **172.1%** of ATK plus **1033** to nearby targets.

normals.name: Lockdown Zone
normals.description: After the second normal attack, hold the button during any attack to deal damage equal to **40%** of ATK plus **240** against the target. The locked-on target is confined and burned for **3** seconds, and damage equal to **26.2%** of ATK plus **157** is dealt to the target every second (ineffective against bosses).

dodge.name: Go, Dolly!
dodge.description: Throw Dolly after dodging. Dolly remains for **10** seconds, drawing in nearby enemies and dealing damage equal to **84.6%** of ATK plus **508** against them, as well as taunting them for **1.5** seconds, causing them to divert their attacks to Dolly (cannot taunt enemies when in a team).

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Sparkling Collider
skill.description:
Spark fires out Sparks that last for **15** seconds and bounce between the target and the Wanderer. Upon hitting the target, the Sparks slow it down for **4** seconds with a **15**-second cooldown. Sparks deal more damage the further they travel. Upon landing a hit, they will deal damage up to **380%** of ATK plus **4200** and inflict a **25**-second Emblazen mark on the target. At the same time, Spark fires **4** bullets, with each bullet dealing damage equal to **50%** of ATK plus **300** against its target. Spark's normal attacks deal **30%** more damage to Emblazen-marked targets. When Sparks hit targets burned by the Wanderer, they burn or ignite the target once and deal additional damage equal to **45%** of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are counted together) and will automatically tally again **1** time. The result calculation cooldown is **6** seconds and the skill cooldown is **30** seconds.
**Passive**: When Sparks is active, each time Spark Attack or Sparks deals damage, the Wanderer gains **1** point of Heat with a **0.9**-second cooldown, for up to **8** points of Heat. When Heat reaches the maximum, the Wanderer gains the effect Ultimate Heat, increasing flame ATK by **10%** for **25** seconds.

discharge.name: Supernova
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer**. Spark enters a charged state, continuously blasting wide-area searing energy beams forward before eventually exploding, dealing damage equal to **750%** of ATK plus **4500**. When Sparks hits targets burned by the Wanderer, it burns or ignites the target **1** time and deals additional damage equal to **45%** of the total remaining damage (multiple burn or incendiary effects are tallied together). The burn tally cooldown is **6** seconds. When the skill is active, gain damage immunity for **1.5** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

advancements.description: Emblazen increases the damage of Spark Attack to **0%**. Skill cooldown drops to **24** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Emblazen increases flame boost by **0%** and the burn tally multiplier to **75%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Restore an additional **75** points of weapon charge each time Spark Attack hits an enemy. Cooldown: **0.9** seconds. Shatter increases by **25%** when Ultimate Heat is active.
Emblazen boosts the damage of Spark Attack to **0%** and doubles Heat acquisition efficiency. Skill cooldown drops to **16** seconds.
